triples.evidence: the system naturally seeks equilibrium, so the ratio between parent and daughter becomes constant
On the right-hand graph, you see the practical outcome

concepts.term: after about a week, the parent has decayed so much that the yield becomes too low, and the generator must be replaced.

evidence: FIGURE 2.3. (Right) A graph of the radioactivity of 99mTc in the technetium generator in the case where the 99mTc is removed every 24 h.
triples.o: the radioactivity of 99mTc in the technetium generator
